About Nerdle
 Nerdle is a daily math puzzle inspired by logic games and a love for numbers. Each day you’ll face a hidden equation to solve in six tries or less.


How to Play
 1. Each guess must be a valid calculation.
 2. Use numbers (0–9) and the symbols + - * / =.
 3. Your guess must include exactly one “=”, with only a number on the right side (e.g., 3+4=7).
 4. Standard math order applies (* and / before + and -).
 5. Commutative answers are accepted (e.g., 10+20=30 and 20+10=30 both work).


Feedback Hints
 • Green = correct symbol in the correct spot.
 • Purple = correct symbol but in the wrong spot.
 • Black = not in the solution.


Tips
 • First guesses should use many different numbers and operators to gather information.
 • Reposition purple tiles to test new spots.
 • Try to place the "=" early to reduce possibilities.
 • Use logic and deduction to narrow the solution quickly.


Goal
 Turn all tiles green and solve the Nerdle! Come back tomorrow for a new challenge.
